attached_at.description: The time when the identity policy was attached to the user group, in RFC3339 format.

group_id.description: The ID of the IAM user group associated with the identity policy.

policy_id.description: The ID of the identity policy to be attached.

policy_name.description: The name of the identity policy associated with the user group.

urn.description: The URN of the attached identity policy.
